parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To ask, request, petition, demand. Of uncertain derivation; to ask.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From proseuchomai; prayer; by implication, an oratory.
